optionalServices.title: 5 years Added Care for your home appliance (includes guarantee period)
Dishwasher Connection
optionalServices.description:
Â£25

The charge for this service includes:

  • Connection of the new appliance to a standard domestic water connection point within 1 metre of the installation location
  • Connection of the appliance to an existing 3-pin 13amp electrical point within 1 metre of the installation location (we are unable to connect to a 'hardwired' electricity point)
  • Connection of the appliance to an existing waste outlet within 1 metre of the installation location
  • A test wash to ensure the appliance is filling and draining correctly
  • The removal and disposal of all packaging

Please note: we are unable to install a freestanding dishwasher where your current appliance is an integrated dishwasher.

optionalServices.title: Dishwasher Disposal
optionalServices.description:
Â£9

The charge for this service includes removal and disposal of your old dishwasher for reuse or recycling.

details.returns:
Returns

We want you to be happy with your purchase. If you're not, depending on the type of product, you can make free returns in the UK via John Lewis shops, Royal Mail, Collect+, or MyHermes. If you need to arrange collection of large or heavy items, call us on 03456 049 049. For international returns queries, call us on +44 1698 545 454. Find out more about returns.

You'll find returns information on your delivery note. Unless faulty, we'd like you to make your return within 90 days of purchase. Exceptions apply to certain products - find out more about our refund policy.

Returns -

See more details
details.productInformation:
The SMS53M02GB dishwasher offers a wide range of functions and enough space for 13 place settings to ensure easy cleaning of all your dishes, pots and pans. And with an impressive A++ for energy efficiency, you can be sure this model is environmentally responsible and designed to save on running costs.

Child lock
This clever design will ensure children can’t tamper with the controls, giving you piece of mind when it comes to the safety of your home.

VarioFlex basket system
This clever system is designed to cater to all of your cutlery, plates dishes, pots and pans. With top and bottom baskets, which are flexible in their design, you will have ample space no matter what needs cleaning.

EcoSilence Drive™
Because this machine is super quiet, you can take full advantage of off-peak energy costs without being disturbed during the night by noisy dishwashing. A brushless motor provides a quieter, faster, more energy efficient performance, while a timer delay of up to 24 hours lets you programme the dishwasher to start at a time most convenient for you.

VarioSpeed
This function cleans dishes in up to half the time, whilst providing the best possible cleaning and drying results - great if you need your dishes in a hurry.

ActiveWater hydraulic system
This dishwasher only uses 9.5 litres of water per wash, and every single drop is used to the maximum so you never have to worry about wasting any.

AquaMix
This glass protection system ensures extra gentle handling for your delicate glasses, making sure they always come out sparkling and super clean without getting broken.

Self-cleaning
The self-cleaning filter system with a 3-piece corrugated filter makes maintenance easier and will help to prolong the life and performance of your machine.

attributes.name: Quick wash
attributes.toolTip: Speedy programme when you need items cleaned quickly

attributes.name: Drying performance
attributes.toolTip: Graded on performance A - G, with A being the highest grade

attributes.name: Overflow protection
attributes.toolTip: An anti-flood device prevents the machine from being damaged by flooding from the inlet pipe

attributes.name: Energy Rating
attributes.toolTip: Graded on performance, from A+++ to G, with A+++ being the highest rating. Higher ratings mean better energy efficiency

attributes.name: Place Settings
attributes.toolTip: A complete set of items provided for one person at a meal

attributes.name: Noise Level
attributes.toolTip: How noisy, in decibels, the machine is. The lower the dB, the quieter the appliance

attributes.name: Estimated Annual Energy Consumption
attributes.toolTip: Typical annual amount used by a 4 person household

attributes.name: Program Sequence Indicator
attributes.toolTip: Tells you the progress of your washing/drying cycle

attributes.name: Next Day Delivery
attributes.toolTip: We offer next working day delivery of appliances in selected areas. See our delivery information page for conditions

attributes.name: Adjustable racking
attributes.toolTip: Lets you move the racking around to fit large or awkward items

attributes.name: Delicate Wash
attributes.toolTip: A gentle clean, designed to protect delicate items, such as glasses

attributes.name: Energy Consumption Per Standard Cycle
attributes.toolTip: Based on the drying cycle of the standard cotton programme at full load. Actual energy consumption per cycle will depend on how the appliance is used.

attributes.name: Time remaining indicator
attributes.toolTip: Tells you how long the programme's got to go

attributes.name: Wash performance
attributes.toolTip: Graded on performance A - G, with A being the highest grade. The higher the grade the more energy efficient the appliance.
